casebody.data:
Theodore E. DE MARS, as Owner of THE Scow LILLIAN, Appellee, v. SEABOARD SAND & GRAVEL CORPORATION, Appellant. No. 277 Circuit Court of Appeals, Second Circuit. Feb. 4, 1935. Purdy & Purdy, of New York City gohn E Purdy and Edmund F. Lamb, both of New York City, of counsel), for appel-jant_ Single & Tyler, of New York City (Christopher E Heckman of New York City, of counsel), or appellee.

Before MANTON, SWAN, and AUGUSTUS N. HAND, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Decree (8 F. Supp. 625) affirmed.
